item.description: Error 404: Page Not Found Oopsie! It seems that the page that you’re trying to access doesn’t exist. ðŸ˜Ÿ If you’re sure that it exists, chances are it might have been moved to a new link! You may search for it on the home page.

So, Who Am I? Iâ€™m just another teenager who likes writing, programming and making stuff. Even setting the title as Who Am I for this article is reminding me of whoami in Linux. I feel the inner urge to contribute something to the Internet because I love writing and I believe posting something online enables users all around the globe to see your work and suggest improvements. Recently I’ve also started taking interest in web designing and hosting the fruitful results of which these site and blogs are!
